title: Magiblot

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Basic Spell**: Pick a target or a slot in the rolelist, the target or player in that slot will be indirectly astrally roleblocked.
- **Hex** (2x): Pick a target, if they are executed or killed by a non-koopa tonight or tomorrow, their role and will are not shown. You may also control them at the next night as if they were alive.
- **Obscure** (1x): Pick a Koopa member, they will die ignoring anything stopping it. They will still be able to use abilities and passives, and be the factional attacker.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock Immune.
- Targets you roleblock gain roleblock immunity for the next night.
- When using **Obscure**, you may disguise one of the target's role or cause of death as another role.

desc:
Post 4967
*"These mad mages live in the space between dimensions. They are floating black stains of magic that only appear long enough to hurl spells at you."*
